title: (Late) Predictions for 2015
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author forgot to make predictions for 2015 at the beginning of the year.
- The author makes predictions and grades them at the end of the year.
- The predictions cover world events, personal life, and the SCC blog.

Key learnings:
- Predictions can help test one's calibration.
- Acceptable confidence levels include 50%, 60%, 70%, 80%, 90%, 95%, and 99%.

Key questions:
- What other predictions are worth considering?
- What will happen to the author's project?
- What other rituals will the author participate in or lead?
